events.title: Weekly Event Schedule
events.subtitle: Check event times and manage attendance

events.duplicate_schedule_entry: Same day and time already registered.
events.error_end_before_start: End time cannot be before start time

notification.start_body: {{title}} has started now! Protect your headquarters.
notification.warning_body: {{title}} will start in 10 minutes! Get ready.

modal.set_day_time_desc: Set the event days and times.
modal.bear_hunt_single_time: Bear Hunt allows only one time slot.
modal.admin_add_attendees_message: Attendees added by admins will appear here.
modal.reset_status_desc: Clear penalties and reset to default.

events.p15_description: Deploy all your troops for a massive offensive.
events.server_castle_description: The most important server battle to elect the King
events.server_dragon_description: Battle to determine the strongest alliance in the server
events.server_svs_prep_description: Preparation stage for war against other servers
events.server_svs_battle_description: War stage where servers clash directly
events.alliance_foundry_description: Alliance battle to capture factories and earn rewards
events.alliance_mobilization_description: Event to complete missions together with alliance members
events.alliance_mercenary_description: Hunt mercenaries and earn rewards for the entire alliance
events.alliance_bear_description: Hunt bears that appear in alliance territory
events.alliance_joe_description: Defensive battle to protect alliance headquarters
events.a_citadel_description: Citadel battle to determine the best alliance
events.server_immigrate_description: Period to migrate to other servers or accept lords from other servers
events.server_merge_description: Event where adjacent servers merge into one
events.p16_description: Spin the lucky wheel to get rare rewards.
events.p6_description: Honor given to the best angler.
events.p7_description: Clear the city's snow to keep citizens safe.
events.p13_description: A dazzling journey into the unknown world.
events.p2_description: Eliminate powerful beasts and restore peace.
events.p3_description: Roll the dice to find treasures.
events.p4_description: Collect silver shell treasures from the sea.
events.p8_description: Light of hope opening a new era.
events.p11_description: Awaken the ancient energy Flame Crystal.

manual.gateDesc: This is the screen where you select your alliance and login when first accessing WOS Commander.
manual.enterDashboardDesc: Common login for members, officers, and alliance admins
manual.applyAdminDesc: Used when creating a new alliance dashboard
manual.lordNameDesc: Game Nickname or ID registered by admin
manual.autoComplete: Auto-complete: Recently entered records can be quickly selected from the dropdown.
manual.sysMasterDesc: Overall management and alliance request approval
manual.opAdminDesc: Event schedule registration and attendance check
manual.roleWarning: Important: Operation and general accounts must be registered by the Alliance Admin before logging in.
manual.adminApplyNotice: ‚Äª Approval takes 1-2 hours. Please wait after submittng.
manual.eventCalendarDesc: Check all weekly events at a glance and manage details.
manual.allianceEventDesc: Events performed as an alliance like Bear Hunt, Fortress, etc.
manual.serverEventDesc: State vs State, Castle Battle, Foundry, etc.
manual.individualEventDesc: Events for personal growth like Frostfire, King of Icefield, etc.
manual.roleMasterDesc: The highest authority of the system, controlling data of all servers and alliances. Master account responsible for new alliance creation, admin approval, and core system settings.
manual.roleAllianceAdminDesc: The person in charge of their alliance. Manages overall alliance operations including member approval/rejection, officer appointment, alliance name change, and strategy document link management.
manual.roleOpAdminDesc: Practical operation staff within the alliance. Registers detailed times for weekly event schedules, manages attendance and logs by event, and manages dashboard notices in real-time.
manual.roleGeneralDesc: Can view all alliance information and check their own attendance directly. Views registered strategy documents or hero combination info and participates in communication.
manual.roleTip: Tip: You can check your current role by the color of the profile icon in the top right.
manual.themeSwitchDesc: Switches between Dark Mode and Light Mode.
manual.installBtnDesc: Guides how to use like an app by 'Add to Home Screen' (PWA).
manual.profileAdminDesc: Menu to open admin menu (Logout, Member Mgmt, Strategy Settings, etc.).
manual.noticeDesc: Displays important information at the top of the dashboard. Admins can edit content and set visibility with the ‚úèÔ∏è icon.
manual.weeklyEventsDesc: Check active (yellow), upcoming (green), and expired (gray) events at a glance. KST/UTC timezone switching available.
manual.heroInfoDesc: Check stats, skills, and recommended combinations for all heroes.
manual.eventOpsDesc: Check alliance event schedules, request participation, and check attendance.
manual.strategyDocsDesc: Directly view Google Sheet layouts or strategy documents registered by the admin.
manual.memberMgmtDesc: Bulk upload via Excel, individual add/delete, permission granting
manual.strategySetDesc: External document URL integration and management
manual.scheduleSetDesc: Time/Day setting via the üìÖ icon on event cards
manual.adminWarning: Caution: Admin rights apply only to the relevant alliance. Granted rights are not maintained when viewing other alliances.
manual.anonymousLoginDesc: You can view event schedules without logging in by entering server/alliance info (Notice/Attendance/Strategy not available)
manual.themeFontDesc: Adjust Dark Mode and font size from the top menu.
manual.penaltyDesc: Unannounced absences may result in penalties according to alliance rules.
manual.pwaInstallDesc: Use 'Add to Home Screen' in your browser to use as an app.
manual.aPw: Please ask your alliance admin to reset it.
manual.aUnreg: The admin must register your character name first.
manual.resetInfoConfirm: Would you like to clear all entered information?
manual.resetInfoSuccess: All login information has been cleared.
manual.requireAllFields: Please enter both server number and alliance name.
manual.requireAdminAuth: Please enter admin ID and password.
manual.applySuccessDesc: You will be able to login after system admin approval.
manual.masterPwError: System master password does not match.
manual.gateLoginAndApply: Please enter server number and alliance name to apply.
manual.loginInputError: Please enter both Lord name and password.

install.title: Install Guide
install.step3: Use as a convenient app from the home screen!

strategy.title: Strategy Docs
strategy.subtitle: Real-time Alliance Notice & Layout
strategy.network_error: Check your network connection or try again later.
strategy.access_denied_file: Failed to load file. Please contact administrator.
strategy.access_denied_google: This document is in a protected area. Login with an authorized Google account is required.
strategy.request_permission_desc: Tell the admin your email and request 'Viewer' permission.
strategy.switch_account_desc: Check if your current browser is logged in with a different account.
strategy.settings_desc: Enter the Google Spreadsheet URL to link.

heroes.empty_msg: Hero information for this generation is coming soon.

tooltips.story: Check the hero's background story and settings.
tooltips.shards: Check the shard information needed for hero evolution.
tooltips.skills: Check the hero's exploration, expedition, and special skill information.

descriptions.jeronimo: A legendary leader who returned from the edge of death. Jeronimo's presence on the battlefield alone inspires his allies and strikes fear into his enemies.
descriptions.natalia: A cold but brilliant strategist. Natalia's precise calculations and unwavering composure have led countless battles to victory.
descriptions.molly: A cheerful but fierce warrior. Molly's energy is infectious, and her combat skills are unmatched in close-quarters encounters.
descriptions.zinman: A master of defense who stands like an immovable mountain. Zinman's shield has protected his allies from the most devastating attacks.
descriptions.flint: The story of Flint is being prepared. Please check back later for the full background of this hero.

descriptions.kato: King Kato from a distant land has come to recover his stolen national treasure. He is a master of the sword and a wise leader who protects his people.
descriptions.sonia: Chief Engineer Sonia of the submarine Neptune is intelligent and ambitious. She controls the battlefield with her freezing technology and surprise tactics.
descriptions.hendrick: Captain Hendrick of the Neptune is searching for his 'sunken homeland'. He is a master of navigation and a reliable leader who ensures the safety of his crew.

descriptions.hank: Hank, a brave pioneer of the Icebreaker Alliance, has a strong spirit forged through decades of adventure. Beneath his rugged appearance, he is a gentle soul who gives hope to children and crushes enemy defenses with his signature saw.
